title: Can Timothée Chalamet speak French? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, fluently. It’s one of his mother tongues.Sometimes he code-switches with English. Some words or expressions. A true bilingual.He makes some mistakes, but any speaker does (conditional, subjunctive). One difference: a few mistakes with the gender of substantive (un question, un solution). Not a big deal.It’s difficult for him to use some concepts in French, as he tranfers them from English. He pronounces some cognates with the English pronunciation. His French is excellent.
